import React from 'react'; import moment from 'moment'; const VotingCard = (props) => { let vote = props.voteQuestionDtls, status = vote.outcome return (
props.openVotingDtls(props)}>
{vote.type}
#{(vote.contentId)} {vote.title}: {vote.question && (vote.question)}
Yes {vote.yesPerc}%
No {vote.noPerc}%
{status}
) } export default VotingCard;
